MemeDef.label: fishing culture
MemeDef.description: Serene and therapeutic, placid lakes and lapping shores are criminally underappreciated. With a little time or simple engineering rivers and oceans alike can leave our bellies full of tasty fish.

creation(tag=meme_Anglers) ->[deity0_name] spoke to all [deity0_possessive] followers and told them: "Again, the kingdom of heaven is like a dragnet cast into the sea, and gathering fish of every kind."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Anglers) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural], "Follow Me, and I will make you fishers of men."
intro(tag=meme_Anglers) ->[memberNamePlural] built a great [altarName] on the [place_summary] [place_name], and great angling competitions took place there every year.
conflict(tag=meme_Anglers) ->An envious [foeLeader], seeking to deny the will of [deity0_name], told [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] to poison the lakes and seas surrounding the [altarName].

founderJoin(tag=meme_Anglers) ->[deity0_name] blessed a [place_job] named [founderName] with [deity0_possessive] divine intelligence and [founder_pronoun] built a great water purifier, and the waters once again teamed with thousands of fish.
victory(tag=meme_Anglers) ->The [foeSoldiers] and the [foeLeader] were humiliated and thwarted, and they had to leave the [memberNamePlural] alone.
setup(tag=meme_Anglers) ->Our founder [founderName] was the greatest angler to have lived. No fish was big enough for [founderName_objective].

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Anglers) ->[founderName] taught us that fishing is a state of mind. [founderName_pronoun] always said that the charm of fishing is that it is the pursuit of what is elusive but attainable, a perpetual series of occasions for hope.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Anglers) ->I've spent as much of my life fishing as decency allowed, and sometimes I don't let even that get in my way. I have learned that
lesson(tag=meme_Anglers) ->fishing is a hard job. Fishing at night. Rain. Day, night. You have to be wise and smart. And quick.
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Anglers) ->After a day's fishing, I'll know the solution to something or have good ideas that were not accessible before.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Anglers) ->The archotechs filled the oceans and the rivers with wondrous plenty, accessible to anyone with the knowledge to take advantage of it.
archistFact(tag=meme_Anglers) ->Archotechs value resourcefulness above other things, and we must accept the bounty of the waters as their gift.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Anglers) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will be the greatest anglers, and their catch will be the ones worthy of transcendence.
animistFact(tag=meme_Anglers) ->The spirits of fish provide us with the greatest bounty: the teeming life present in rivers and oceans.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_Anglers)->[itIsSaid] we will learn the ways of insects to find food whenever it's needed, by exploiting the greatest bounty: the teeming life present in rivers and oceans.
chthonianProphecy(tag=meme_Anglers)->Ph'nglui mglw'nafh [deity0_name] [place_name] wgah'nagl fhtagn.
esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_Anglers)->We will discern what is hidden behind these secrets, perhaps by divining the entrails of dead fish.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_Anglers)->Like the slippery fish that hide beyond the abyssal depths, we will strike from the darkness and we will be unstoppable.

introMemo(tag=meme_Anglers)->Good news! In this year's company-wide raffle we are again including as a prize a two weeks, all expenses paid fishing trip! I know you are as excited as I am, so get those tickets as soon as possible!
